title: Photos: July Fourth celebrations across the country
description: The weather took center stage during July Fourth celebrations across the nation Tuesday, with blue skies over Washington, D.C., for the annual National Independence Day parade.

title: Federal judge restricts Biden officials from contact with social media firms
description: A federal judge on Tuesday restricted some Biden administration officials from meeting and communicating with social media companies to moderate their content.

title: Secret Service investigating 'white, powdery substance' found in West Wing
description: The Secret Service is investigating a “white, powdery substance” found in the White House Sunday that D.C. fire officials said tested positive for cocaine.

title: Signs of life — and support — for Prigozhin with Wagner's future still a mystery
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin has seemingly resurfaced after Wagner's armed rebellion, appealing to the Russian public for support in a new audio message.

title: Fans keep throwing stuff at artists onstage. Will it ever stop?
description: While throwing objects onstage at concerts is not new, experts say the way we feel about the act and how we treat artists is changing.

title: DeSantis is squeezing the sunshine out of Florida’s public records law, critics say
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, who is running for president, has alarmed transparency watchdogs by supporting efforts to block the release of records.

title: Injured hiker with no cell service saved using iPhone’s SOS feature
description: A woman hiking outside of Los Angeles fractured her leg in a remote forest with no cellphone service — but she was able to contact first responders using the iPhone 14’s life-saving new SOS feature. Erin McLaughlin reports for TODAY.

title: Meta to launch conversation app Threads to rival troubled Twitter
description: The owner of Facebook and Instagram is set to launch a new "conversation app" called Threads on Thursday that is expected to compete directly with Twitter.

title: Democrats are already running on abortion rights in battleground states
description: In swing states with vulnerable Democratic senators up for re-election in 2024, the party is already hammering likely opponents over abortion rights.

title: Roller coaster riders stuck upside down for hours after 'mechanical failure' at Wisconsin festival
description: Roller coaster riders at the Forest County Festival in Crandon, Wisconsin festival were stuck hanging upside down for hours over the holiday weekend.

title: Eight struck in Philadelphia shooting, police say
description: Eight people were struck in a shooting in Philadelphia on Monday night, police confirmed.

title: Churchill Downs extends its ban on trainer Bob Baffert through 2024
description: The company that owns horse racing's crown jewel, the Kentucky Derby, announced Monday that its two-year ban on trainer Bob Baffert is being extended through the end of 2024.

title: 'Sham' website customer likely didn't affect Supreme Court ruling on same-sex weddings, experts say
description: Legal experts shot down the idea that an apparently bogus inquiry to a site designer in Colorado opposed to same-sex marriages played a key role in last week's decision.
